          <title>
            <string language="en">Salt dissolving in water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Salz, das im Wasser sich auflöst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sel se dissolvant dans l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sal que dissolve-se na água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sale che si dissolve in acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλατισμένη διάλυση στο ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sal que disuelve en agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the mass of salty water is the same as adding the mass of salt and water before mixing.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolving</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salty water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stirring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Masse des salzigen
Wassers dieselbe wie ist, die Masse des Salzes und des Wassers 
hinzufügend, bevor sie mischt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la masse de l'eau 
salée est identique qu'ajoutant la masse du sel et de l'eau avant le 
mélange.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a massa da água 
salty é a mesma que adicionando a massa do sal e da água antes de 
misturar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la massa di acqua 
salata è la stessa del aggiungendo la massa di sale e di acqua prima 
della miscelazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η μάζα του αλμυρού 
ύδατος είναι η ίδια με προσθέτοντας τη μάζα του άλατος και του 
ύδατος πρίν αναμιγνύει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la masa del agua 
salada es igual que agregando la masa de la sal y del agua antes de 
mezclarse.</string>
          </description>
